examples: did my good deed for the day

definition: a usually illustrious act or action : feat, exploit

examples: righteous in word and in deed

definition: a signed and usually sealed instrument (see instrument entry 1 sense 5) containing some legal transfer, bargain, or contract
examples: gave them the deed to the house

definition: to convey or transfer by a signed instrument containing a legal transfer, bargain, or contract : to convey or transfer by deed (see deed entry 1 sense 4)
examples: deeded the house to her son
